question.stem: An example of lots kinetic energy would be

choices.text: Drinking a cold glass of water
choices.label: A

choices.text: A snail moving across the sidewalk
choices.label: B

question.stem: A person can grow cabbage in January with the help of what product?
A frog, in winter, will burrow itself into soft mud, until it freezes, then in the spring

choices.text: it melts, because it is warm-blooded
choices.label: A

choices.text: it unfreezes, because it is cold-blooded
choices.label: B

choices.text: it remains frozen until it dies
choices.label: C

choices.text: it dies, because it is warm-blooded
choices.label: D
